entry.title: [RBX][Dedicated Servers] - Room 01
entry.content:
Dec 5, 09:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/12/2022 08:22 UTC
End Time : 05/12/2022 09:02 UTC
Root cause : The incident is due to the following maintenance https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/lbmryv77h78z
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 5, 09:01 UTC
Identified - Start time : 05/12/2022 08:22 UTC
Service impact : 6 Servers in the room 01 are no longer responding.
Root cause : The incident is due to the following maintenance https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/lbmryv77h78z
Ongoing actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it.

entry.title: [LIM1][Dedicated Servers] - L107A12
entry.content:
Dec 5, 09:15 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/12/2022 08:20 UTC
End Time : 05/12/2022 09:05 UTC
Root cause : The incident was due to a problem with our cooling system which caused the circuit breaker to trip.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Dec 5, 08:33 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 05/12/2022 08:20 UTC
Service impact : All services are unavailable.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
